name: Tisen Card PC
description:
Tisen Card PC

Tisen Card PC is a mythology-based card game that supports up to 2 local players. 

Enter the world, join one of the teams, fight against other teams and make yourself the best!  Fight against creatures and become a legend! Find story pieces, explore the lore and follow the adventure through the seasons!

  • Singleplayer or 2 player local multiplayer
  • Can be played with only mouse or only keyboard
  • Lore
  • 3 game modes
  • Teams
  • Boss matches
  • Card customization
  • Ranks
  • Seasons
  • And more...
Tisen Card Mobile for Android Google Play
